value.title: StarCraft 2: The WORST Terran Build Order! (Viewer Games)
value.excerpt: Three viewer submitted games of StarCraft 2 of players in Silver, Gold and Platinum League. Very fun (but very cringy) viewer submitted games.  If you want me to cast your game next, you can submitted your replay to replays@lowko.tv.   Support my work on Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/lowkotv Become
